title: 23 Doctoral studentships at Södertörn University
description:
Södertörn University in south Stockholm is a dynamic institute of higher education with a unique profile and high academic standard.
A large proportion of the university staff holds doctorates and there is a strong link between undergraduate education and research. Södertörn University currently has 12 000
students and 800 employees. Södertörn University is an equal
opportunities employer.
